titles.title: A bill to provide that a portion of the income derived from trust or restricted land held by an individual Indian shall not be considered as a resource or income in determining eligibility for assistance under any Federal or federally assisted program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2820)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/11/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal law to exclude a specified amount of income from trust or restricted land held by an individual Indian from consideration as income for purposes of Federal assistance eligibility.
